name: Morphoid
description:
Left, right, straight... Or not?!

Morphoid is a modern 3D puzzle game and you need to have a good spatial imagination.

Help Morphoid, the cuboid with special abilities to solve different puzzles and share your gameplay videos directly from ingame to friends and the world (youtube and other platforms).

Move Morphoid through swipe gestures as fast as you possible with as little as possible moves and falls to the goal platform. On the way Morphoid has to use beam-, transport- und switch platforms.

Morphoid got the ability to switch his shape to other shapes to cross big gaps to reach the goal.

Features:

- A cool cuboid with special powers

- Share your gameplay directly from ingame through youtube and other platforms, thanks to Everyplay!

- Platforms with different functions

- Modern 3D graphics

- Relaxing background music

Follow on Facebook
